nodes.text: Paxton Rall was a Twi'lek male pirate.

Paxton Rall appears in the BioWare massively multiplayer online roleplaying video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. He can be found on Carrick Station, Vaiken Spacedock, Taris, Alderaan, Nar Shaddaa, Coruscant, Balmorra, Corellia, and Tatooine. Paxton Rall can be used as a companion by players who bought a subscription before December 14, 2018. Paxton Rall has since been made made unlockable for all players as part of Galactic Season 1, following the release of Update 6.3 "The Dark Descent".
